title: shen tamizh Osai
sahitya:
shen tamizh Osai kELIrO vIrattamizh Osai kELIrO bhAratiyin 
tamizhOsai kELIrO vIrattamizh Osai kELIrO bhAratiyin tamizh Osai kELIrO
				(toghaiyarA)
sudantiramE uyir sutantiramE deivam ena sutantirak-kanal OngiDavE narpATTishattu 
jaya bhAratam, jaya bhAratam vandE mAtaram ena muzhangiya shen tamizh Osai kELIrO


anupallavi

  kaNNanE uyar kAdal pADuvAr Om kALi annaiyin pAdam nADuvAr (kamalak)
kaNNanE uyar kAdal pADuvAr Om kALi annaiyin pAdam nADuvAr vIrattamizh Osai kELIrO
				(toghaiyarA)


caraNam    kaNNam mukham marandu pOnAl kaNgaL irundup-payan uNDO ennakkaDaluvAr
annai parAshaktiyin aruL irundAl ulagilinrum anaittum vashappaDumO enrAr kamalak-
kaNNanE uyar kAdal pADuvAr Om kALi annaiyin pAdam nADuvAr (kamalak) 
vIrattamizh Osai kELIrO
